  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085887</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ongoing assessment strategies for writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fortwährende Einschätzung Strategien für 
Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies continues d'évaluation pour 
l'écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias ongoing da avaliação para a 
escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie continue di valutazione per scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρέχουσες στρατηγικές αξιολόγησης για</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrategias en curso del gravamen para la 
escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Making final assessment easier by helping students improve the quality of their writing along the way.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abschließende Einschätzung einfacher bildend, 
indem Sie Kursteilnehmern helfen, verbessern Sie die Qualität ihres 
Schreibens entlang der Methode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En facilitant l'évaluation finale en aidant des 
étudiants améliorez la qualité de leur écriture le long de la 
voie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo a avaliação final mais fácil ajudando 
estudantes melhore a qualidade de sua escrita ao longo da maneira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rendendo la valutazione finale più facile 
aiutando gli allievi migliori la qualità della loro scrittura lungo 
il modo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθιστώντας την τελική αξιολόγηση ευκολότερη με τη 
βοήθεια των σπουδαστών να βελτιωθεί η ποιότητα του γραψίματός 
τους κατά μήκος του τρόπου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haciendo el gravamen final más fácil ayudando a 
estudiantes mejore la calidad de su escritura a lo largo de la manera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

        </metaMetadata>

        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
